Testing setup
=============

Single Server
-------------
mongod --dbpath=./db

Replicaset
----------
mongo --nodb
var x = new ReplSetTest({"useHostName":"false", "nodes" : {node0 : {}, node1 : {}, node2 : {}}})
x.startSet();
var config = x.getReplSetConfig()
x.initiate(config);
